_A_COLUMNS_BASIC_DESCRIPTION_: The .a_columns container distributes nested .a_column across the width. Without explicit widths, columns stretch evenly.
_A_COLUMNS_COUNT_DESCRIPTION_: The .a_columns_count_{n} class sets the number of columns (1-12), enables wrapping, and defines the --a_column_count variable. Column width is set with .a_column_{n} and is calculated relative to the chosen count.
_A_COLUMNS_GAP_DESCRIPTION_: Gaps are set with .a_columns_gap_x_{0-8} and .a_columns_gap_y_{0-8}. By default both axes use 0.75rem.
_A_COLUMNS_OFFSET_DESCRIPTION_: Left offset: .a_column_offset_{n}, right offset: .a_column_offset_right_{n}, where n is 0 to 11.
_A_COLUMNS_BREAKPOINTS_DESCRIPTION_: Add the suffixes _mobile, _tablet, _touch, _desktop, _widescreen, _fullhd, _large to .a_columns_count_*, .a_columns_gap_*, .a_column_*, .a_column_offset_*. Breakpoints: mobile <= 768px, tablet 769-1023px, touch <= 1023px, desktop 1024-1215px, widescreen 1216-1407px, fullhd 1408-1599px, large >= 1600px.
